import React, { useEffect , useState} from 'react'; import '../Home.css'; import Pages from '../Pages/Pages'; import moment from 'moment'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { resetSocialMediaSelections, } from '../../../redux/actions/socialMediaActions'; import { Row, Col, Table, Image, Dropdown, } from 'react-bootstrap'; // Translations import { trans } from '../../../Translations'; import { FaInfoCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; function Billing(props) { let { lang, socialMediaPageSelected, } = props; const [showPopover, setShowPopover] = useState(false); const [choice, setChoice] = useState({ id:"plan", value: trans[lang].billing.billingPlan}); const renderPopover = () => (
setShowPopover(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setShowPopover(false)}>

{trans[lang].billing.infoPopover}

); const handlePopover = (delay) => { setTimeout( () => { setShowPopover(!showPopover); },delay) }; return (

{trans[lang].billing.title}

handlePopover('20')} onMouseLeave={() => handlePopover('700')} /> {showPopover && renderPopover()} {/* Top bar */}

{trans[lang].billing.billingPlan}

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { lang : state.socialMediaR.lang, socialMediaPageSelected : state.socialMediaR.socialMediaPageSelected, } }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { resetSocialMediaSelections })(Billing);
